import folium
def get_geo_data(location_list):


    from geopy.geocoders import Nominatim
    import pandas as pd

    
    team_locations = pd.DataFrame()
    geolocator = Nominatim(user_agent="FRG")
    for addresses in location_list:
        location = geolocator.geocode(addresses)
        name = addresses
        lattitude = location.latitude
        longitude = location.longitude
        #location_temp = pd.DataFrame({'location': name, 'latitude': lattitude, 'longitude': longitude})
        #team_locations = pd.concat([team_locations, location_temp], ignore_index=True)
        team_locations = team_locations.append({'location': name, 'latitude': lattitude, 'longitude': longitude}, ignore_index=True)
    return team_locations

address_test = ["New Orleans", "Los Angeles", "San Francisco", "Chicago", "Copenhagen", "London"]
get_geo_data(address_test)
team_location = team_locations
max_bounds = [[3, -180], [73, -50]]
folium_figure = folium.Figure(width=500, height=250)
map_usa = folium.Map(location=[37.0902, -95.7129], width = '%100', height = '%100',zoom_start=5,
                      max_bounds = max_bounds, min_zoom=5, max_zoom=12, min_lat = 12, max_lat = 70, min_lon = -180, max_lon = -30)

for index, row in team_location.iterrows():
    folium.Marker([row['latitude'], row['longitude']], popup=row['location']).add_to(map_usa)

map_usa
